{{ site.title }}

{{ site.description }}

Version: {{ site.current_version }}

This site contains developer documentation for the following resources:

  • Styles: This page includes most basic styles, like grid, typography, buttons, forms, etc.
  • Icons: Shows how you can implement and style our icons in various ways, including a complete list of all {{ site.data._icons | size }} icons in our custom set!
  • Components: These are made up mostly using multiple items from the styles section, plus some component-specific treatment. Examples include login form, navbar, dropdowns and more.

NOTE: This project is in development, so stay tuned for more additions and improvements in the coming months. The design for this site is a basic placeholder using core styles from Apollo. A new design will be implemented when these docs are incorporated into the Design Resource Base later this year.
